Control Name: Informs Data Subjects When Additional Information Is Acquired—Data subjects are informed if the entity develops or acquires additional information about them for its use.

control_attributes.Control: Informs Data Subjects When Additional Information Is Acquired—Data subjects are informed if the entity develops or acquires additional information about them for its use.
control_attributes.SubCategory: P3.1 Personal information is collected consistent with the entity’s objectives related to privacy.
